00015 #include "testdriver.h"

00020 
00021 REGISTER_TYPE(XDriverList, TestDriver, "Test driver: random number generation");
00022 
00023 XTestDriver::XTestDriver(const char *name, bool runtime, 
00024                          const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00025                          const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00026                          const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00027                          const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00028     XDummyDriver<XPrimaryDriver>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers),
00029     m_entryX(create<XScalarEntry>("X", false, 
00030                                   dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()), "%.3g")),
00031     m_entryY(create<XScalarEntry>("Y", false,
00032                                   dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()), "%+.4f[K]"))
00033 {
00034     scalarentries->insert(m_entryX);
00035     scalarentries->insert(m_entryY);
00036 }
00037 
00038 void
00039 XTestDriver::showForms() {
00040 //! impliment form->show() here
00041 }
00042 void
00043 XTestDriver::start()
00044 {
00045     m_thread.reset(new XThread<XTestDriver>(shared_from_this(), &XTestDriver::execute));
00046     m_thread->resume();
00047 }
00048 void
00049 XTestDriver::stop()
00050 {
00051     if(m_thread) m_thread->terminate();
00052 //    m_thread->waitFor();
00053 }
00054 void
00055 XTestDriver::analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&)
00056 {
00057     //! Since raw buffer is Fast-in Fast-out, use the same sequence of push()es for pop()s
00058     m_x = pop<double>();
00059     m_y = pop<double>();
00060     m_entryX->value(m_x);
00061     m_entryY->value(m_y);
00062 }
00063 void
00064 XTestDriver::visualize()
00065 {
00066     //! impliment extra codes which do not need write-lock of record
00067     //! record is read-locked
00068 }
00069 
00070 void *
00071 XTestDriver::execute(const atomic<bool> &terminated)
00072 {
00073     while(!terminated)
00074     {
00075         msecsleep(10);
00076         double x = randMT19937() - 0.2;
00077         double y = randMT19937()- 0.2;
00078         clearRaw();
00079         push(x);
00080         push(y);
00081         finishWritingRaw(XTime::now(), XTime::now());
00082     }
00083     afterStop();
00084     return NULL;
00085 }
